posts.post_content:
I have five T206 cards here. The Batch has a miscut front, where you can see the blue from another card(likely a Batch) on the bottom. The Huslwitt has a big miss on the brown layer, so you can see a ghosting to the side of his head and his body and the bat are in the border. The Owen card has a double name, double factory on the back. The other two cards are commons. Murray looks real nice, but it is trimmed. Bowerman was bought because the B is light and it has no back damage.

Hulswitt $55
Batch $55
Owen $70
Murray and Bowerman $40(total, not each, being sold as a pair)

Or $180 for all of them. Paypal please. Insured delivery is included in prices.
bump to lower prices again, check first post
